| EHNT |
| DTNT |

2. EHNT
3. DTNT
4. C12NT

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

I apologize for my mistake. Here are the valid entities that clearly refer to "Material name" in the given paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PIDT |
| EHNT |
| DTNT |

I removed "C12NT" from the list as it does not clearly refer to a material name.
